title: Yoga class
description: Relax and recharge with a serene yoga session as the sun dips below the horizon. Perfect for all levels, this outdoor experience will leave you feeling refreshed and centered. Dont forget your mat!

title: Local
location: Tech Training Academy, Los Angeles, CA
description: Indulge in a culinary adventure! Sample delicious dishes from top chefs and food trucks, and discover new flavors. A must-attend event for food lovers of all ages!

title: Writing Workshop
description: Unleash your inner writer! Join our workshop to learn tips, techniques, and inspiration to craft compelling stories. Perfect for beginners and seasoned writers alike.

title: Live Jazz Night
description: mmerse yourself in the smooth sounds of live jazz performed by talented local artists. A cozy, intimate evening filled with soulful melodies and great vibes.
location: Tech Training Academy, Sao Paulo, SP

title: Outdoor Movie Night
description: Enjoy a classic film under the stars! Bring your family and friends for a magical evening. Snacks and blankets provided for a cozy, unforgettable experience.

title: Urban Photography
description: Capture the citys hidden gems! Join a professional photographer and explore the best spots to take stunning urban photos. Perfect for beginners and pros alike.
